author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is to disable D88 PU wfs until we completely migrate to D88. The D88 dd4hep wf is also disabled since step2 (DIGI+HLT) can't run at the moment. This is to fix the issue of failure in IB for the PU workflows.

Solve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36833#issuecomment-1028546775

#### PR validation:
-

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
-
title: Temporary disable D88 PU wfs
